name: Boston
description: The North End neighborhood of Boston is filled with restaurants.

name: Philadelphia
description: Philadelphia is a historic American city, visit and check it off your list!

name: San Francisco
description: San Francisco, a hub of modern technology and culture.  Good weather, good beaches, bad traffic.

name: El Paso, Texas
description: This bordertown is full of independent cowboys.  Visit at your own risk.

name: Seoul, Korea
description: Loved visiting Seoul, can't wait to go back!

name: London
description: The weather sucks, but the people and pubs are great!

name: Las Vegas
description: What happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas.

name: Dublin
description: Apparently some of my relatives come from here.  Nice place.

name: Shenzhen
description: The one and only.  An absolutely massive and inspiring city.

name: Jamaica
description: The beaches of Jamaica.  Looks relaxing.

name: Toronto
description: Cold place, but a really nice city.  French culture, hockey, what's not to like.

name: India
description: Have never been to a country so different yet so similar.  Would love to go again.

name: Australia
description: Never been to the outback.  Will have to go one day, just avoid all the deadly plants and animals.
